All that piece and parcel of vacant land situated at Erandankattalai Village, Sriperumbudur Taluk, Kancheepuram District comprised in survey No.45 (part) measuring an extent of 0 Acre and 19 cents and bounded on 

North	: Survey No.36
South	: Survey No.45 (part) and 24 feet wide road
East	: Survey No 38/1 and 20 feet wide road
West	: Survey No.46

And situated within the Registration District of south Chennai and Registration Sub-District of Pammal.

SCHEDULE B PROPERTY
(PROPERTY HEREBY PROPOSED TO BE CONVEYED

547 Sq.ft. of undivided share and interest in all that piece and parcel of the above mentioned schedule “A” vacant land 

SCHEDULE C
(CONSTRUCTION TO BE PUT UP FOR THE ALLOTTEE/PURCHASER)

Residential apartment bearing flat no.GF4, First Floor, G Block Forming part of project Known as “ADRIA” and developed on schedule A property having a super built up area of 937 Sq.Ft or Here abouts including one exclusive covered or parking space.
